title: Ticket #551: RFE: for re-check for VM Universe capability after it is disabled
description:
VM Universe capabilities are problematic to keep available in a pool. There are two cases for why this is the case:

1. condor_startd fails to enable the capability on startup. possibly because a startup order issue.

2. condor_startd disables the capability due to VM creation failures via VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL.

condor_startd must currently be restarted for VM Universe to be re-enabled. A VM Universe recheck interval that called the virtualization subsystem's check script and re-advertised VM Universe capabilities would alleviate this issue. This check interval to be default-disabled such that systems not supporting VM Universe features would only test once.
